channel.title: flight on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in flight on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-14
item.description: Amazon details new warehouse robots, ‘Ernie’ and ‘Bert’ (2 minute read) Amazon is testing out two new robots, Ernie and Bert, to try to reduce strenuous movements for workers.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-20
item.description: Microsoft’s ‘Netflix-for-gaming’ service launches on iPhone and PC this week (2 minute read) Microsoft’s Xbox Cloud Gaming service will roll out in beta on iOS and PCs this week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-29
item.description: Apple search engine efforts ‘stepping up’ as Google deal under threat (4 minute read) Apple has been working on its Applebot crawler since before 2015, and with Google under investigation for antitrust practices, it may have to put it to use.
